posts.message:
at least full networking is coming to bash on windows , hope this mean that tools like nmap and such could finally be used with this build 

but unfortunately this update is only available now if you participate in the insider program and downloaded the build [which is buggy] so i was wondering if there is a way to just update the WSL , like replacing the binaries for it for example ..,, anyone have ideas ?

posts.message:
A ruby gem (with only 1 dependency on HTML Oga parser) for getting the current exchange rates from banks...
currently supports CBE, NBE, CIB, AAIB, BanqueDuCaire and BanqueMisr... but more are planned...
feel free to fork/PR to support different banks or use it in your apps/websites or just from the CMD (MIT Licence, so don't worry)
posts.caption: github.com
posts.description: EGP-Rates - EGP exchange rate scraper from EG Banks

Docker ,devops , machine learning ?

is anyone here hear before about "Skill up program" as they are trying to simulate ITI Program and making tracks just like ITI program in some centers.
the idea is self study with mentors with 1 session per week for 6 months period.
Now they request 200 LE per month  instructor fees for 4 sessions + 80 LE for center fees and the only way for paying is through vodafone cash, no receipts.
This is a good introduction for offline-first PWAs.
